product.title: KUFptva Professional Hair Dryer Nozzle Heat Insulating Nozzle Comb Salon Hair Styling Tools Air Blow Collecting Comb
product.title_excluding_brand: Professional Hair Dryer Nozzle Heat Insulating Nozzle Comb Salon Hair Styling Tools Air Blow Collecting Comb
product.description:
Features:
and
The blow dryer attachment creates smoothe, shinier, sleeker looking hair in less time than traditional blow dryer attachments. It's also safe to use with natural hair, wigs, and extensions.
The clip is angled to precisely concentrate the airflows to reduce frizz, allow the hair to dry quicker, and makes your last longer.
By simply snapping on the patented clips to the end of your blow dryer's concentrators nozzle you turn your hair dryer into a salon straightener.
Use it for straight, , curly, or Afro hair. You can straight hair, create beatiful tousled , or curls for a night out with ease.
Get the sleeker hair results that you can get from a , create any you desire, like you do with a blowdryer. It's also super lightweight so you can take it with you on holidays.


Specifications:
:Aluminium
Color:Black/Rose Red
Size:Approx.6x1.6cm/2.36x0.63inches

Note:
1.Please allow 1-2cm errors due to manual measurement, make sure that you do not mind before you order.
2.Due to the difference between different monitors, the picture may not reflect the actual color of the item.


Package includes:
1 Pair Blow Dryer Comb Attachment
